PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FanCentrifugal
PropertySetDef.Definition: Centrifugal fan occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcFan.

PropertyDef.Name: Arrangement
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the fan and motor drive arrangement as defined by AMCA.\X\0D \X\0D ARRANGEMENT1: Arrangement 1. \X\0D ARRANGEMENT2: Arrangement 2. \X\0D ARRANGEMENT3: Arrangement 3. \X\0D ARRANGEMENT4: Arrangement 4. \X\0D ARRANGEMENT7: Arrangement 7. \X\0D ARRANGEMENT8: Arrangement 8. \X\0D ARRANGEMENT9: Arrangement 9. \X\0D ARRANGEMENT10: Arrangement 10. \X\0D OTHER: Other type of fan drive arrangement.

PropertyDef.Name: DirectionOfRotation
PropertyDef.Definition: The direction of the centrifugal fan wheel rotation when viewed from the drive side of the fan.\X\0D \X\0D CLOCKWISE: Clockwise. \X\0D COUNTERCLOCKWISE: Counter-clockwise. \X\0D OTHER: Other type of fan rotation.

PropertyDef.Name: DischargePosition
PropertyDef.Definition: Centrifugal fan discharge position.\X\0D \X\0D TOPHORIZONTAL: Top horizontal discharge. \X\0D TOPANGULARDOWN: Top angular down discharge. \X\0D DOWNBLAST: Downblast discharge. \X\0D BOTTOMANGULARDOWN: Bottom angular down discharge. \X\0D BOTTOMHORIZONTAL: Bottom horizontal discharge. \X\0D BOTTOMANGULARUP: Bottom angular up discharge. \X\0D UPBLAST: Upblast discharge. \X\0D TOPANGULARUP: Top angular up discharge. \X\0D OTHER: Other type of fan arrangement.
